info.name: Workflow OCR
info.summary: Server side OCR processing via workflow engine
info.description: This app makes it possible to process various files via OCR algorithms. The processing is done via workflow-engine and can therefore easily be customized. Please note that you'll have to install the OcrMyPDF CLI on your Nextcloud server to process PDF files. More installation instructions can be found in the docs https://github.com/R0Wi/workflow_ocr/blob/master/README.md.
info.author: Robin Windey
